name: cs5678_2024sp.h_prism.g03
description: This package implements the PRISM Interaction technique for the XRC framework. PRISM is a technique that allows users to interact and precisely place objects in a 3D environment.

samples.description: The includes a sample showcasing the XRC PRISM implementation in a Unity scene.
Prism prefabs contains materials and prefabs that the user can use or customize the PRISM technique's .
Prism Input Action map is an input action set that users can use to activate the PRISM technique.
